<small>Also see: [[H8248]]</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקַע‎</span>] **verb** ==sink, sink down== (so Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁקַע‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁקַע‎</span>; Arabic has <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be smitten, prostrated, collapse ***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָֽׁקְעָה‎</span>; [[Amos.9.5|Amos 9:5]] ***it shall sink*** like the Nile (of land; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַה‎</span>); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּשְׁקַע‎</span> [[Num.11.2|Num 11:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), of fire, ***it sunk down***, died out; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁקַע‎</span> [[Jer.51.64|Jer 51:64]], of Babylon (like stone in water; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּם‎</span>). **Niph\`al** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁקְעָה‎</span> [[Amos.8.8|Amos 8:8]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], of land, ***sink*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלָה‎</span>; = **Qal** [[Amos.9.5|Amos 9:5]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] erroneous <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשקה‎</span>, compare [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>SG287</sup>). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַשְׁקִיעַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Ezek.32.14|Ezek 32:14]] ***I will make their waters sink***, (settle, grow clear); 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּחְֶבֶל תַּשְׁקִיעַ לְשׁוֺנוֺ‎</span> [[Job.40.25|Job 40:25]] ***with a cord wilt thou make*** his tongue ***sink*** (? pull or press it down; of crocodile; [[BDB#JDMich|Mich]]<sup>Suppl,2349</sup> cited [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] 1477, compare Samaritan <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חבשׁ‎</span> ***bind***).
